name: funcscript-package-check
description: Manual verification sandbox for FuncScript npm packages before publishing.

scripts.pack: rm -rf tarballs && mkdir -p tarballs && npm --prefix ../../funcscript-js pack --pack-destination ./tarballs && npm --prefix ../../funcscript-editor pack --pack-destination ./tarballs
scripts.verify: npm run clean && npm run pack && npm run install:tarballs && npm run check
